values: Bonus Episode | Glenn Beck and Whittney Webb

Today we present to you another podcast, The Glenn Beck Program. 

The Glenn Beck Program is filled with insightful conversations and compelling perspective on American culture and politics. Glenn Beck's quick wit, candid opinions, and engaging personality have made this one of the most popular radio programs in America. 

In this episode, Glenn Beck speaks with Whittney Webb about her gift for locating power and hunting it in its darkest corners. 

"I think this is the most important hour I have ever been a part of in broadcast," Beck said about the conversation. 

Want more of Glenn Beck? Subscribe to The Glenn Beck Program anywhere you listen to podcasts.  https://podfollow.com/620967489
